current_scene.title: Whispers of the Drowned Reef
current_scene.description: You wake on the pale sands of a crescent-shaped island, waves glowing faint blue in the pre-dawn light. Far out at sea, the silhouette of a leaning lighthouse rises from a jagged reef, its lantern long dark. To your right, a narrow path winds toward a small fishing village built on stilts over the water. Half-buried near your hand lies a barnacle-crusted shell box, washed up by the tide.

inspect_box.desc: Inspect the barnacle-crusted shell box beside you.

approach_tower.desc: Head toward the distant lighthouse out on the reef.

walk_to_cottages.desc: Follow the path toward the stilted fishing village.
